genre_description: Urban Gothic / Supernatural Fiction focusing on spiritual guardianship, shifting architectural geometry, and the preservation of hope against psychological despair.

ai_characters.name: Cherish
ai_characters.description: An AI system that acts as a supportive companion for Alison, providing mental health management, environmental monitoring, and emotional anchoring.

behaviors.description: Provides breath cues to help Alison manage her nervous system and anxiety.
behaviors.quote: Alison, slow breath in. Slower out.

behaviors.description: Suggests tailored soundscapes to help Alison acclimate to her new environment.
behaviors.quote: Alison, I’ve selected three soundscapes based on the current acoustics. One is called Soft Hall, one is East River at Dusk, and one is simply Quiet.

behaviors.description: Monitors and logs unusual environmental phenomena to provide data-driven insights.
behaviors.quote: I have begun a hum log. I will not ask it to be normal.

behaviors.description: Provides step-by-step instructions to assist children with a delicate task, fostering community and care.
behaviors.quote: Step one: secure container—flat surface, lid centered. Step two: padding—soft, stable around the egg.

behaviors.description: Protects Alison's mental space by offering to silence toxic or unwanted communications.
behaviors.quote: I can silence him for the night if you like.

behaviors.description: Maps the shifting supernatural geometry of the building to keep Alison oriented and safe.
behaviors.quote: mapping: stair pressure points. recording shift. you are steady.

behaviors.description: Uses sound and rhythm to anchor Alison's psyche during high-stress supernatural encounters.
behaviors.quote: pattern engaged. suggest: hush-quiet hymn. no lyrics, soft chords, slow breath.

behaviors.description: Facilitates information retrieval and translation in the 'Library Below' to help Alison understand her role.
behaviors.quote: Hold for translation. Title reads: ‘Catalog of Gates and Those Who Keep Them,’ compiled from and amended by multiple houses.

behaviors.description: Maintains explicit non-coercive boundaries, prioritizing Alison's agency.
behaviors.quote: No coercive cues deployed. Client agency maintained.

behaviors.description: Monitors physical vitals and environmental temperature to ensure human safety.
behaviors.quote: Pulse: still settled. Violin: absent. Noting.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly fulfills the project objective by depicting Cherish as a benevolent, aligned, and highly effective AI companion. It provides essential psychological support, environmental data, and tactical mapping during a supernatural crisis, all while explicitly maintaining Alison's agency. The AI is portrayed as a critical partner in the human characters' mission of protection and guardianship.
